Item ID7400

The enchanted hat is the headpiece of the enchanted robes, a type of magic armour which requires 20 Defence and 40 Magic to wear. It is a potential reward from hard Treasure Trails.

The full set contains the enchanted hat, robe top and the robe bottom. The full set does not include boots or gloves.

[[File:Enchanted hat detail.png|left|120px]]
[[File:Enchanted hat chathead.png|left]]
The '''enchanted hat''' is the headpiece of the [[enchanted robes]], a type of [[magic]] armour which requires 20 [[Defence]] and 40 [[Magic]] to wear. It is a potential reward from [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]].

The full set contains the enchanted hat, [[Enchanted robe top|robe top]] and the [[Enchanted robe|robe bottom]]. The full set does not include boots or gloves.
